thread.title: Lake Shore Plant's final demolition tonight
thread.title_full: Lake Shore Plant's final demolition tonight

author: John Funk, The Plain Dealer
title: Lake Shore Plant's final demolition tonight
text: The main 306-foot high smokestack of FirstEnergy's Lake Shore power plant and last remaining wall of the nearly 117-year-old building is coming down about tonight with a series of explosions. Once a state-of-the-art power plant, Lake Shore eventually operated only when extra power was needed. FirstEnergy closed the plant in 2015 rather than upgrade its pollution controls.
